snippet.title: Video Game Fables (RPG indie game) - Indie Maker Syndicate trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam and play the demo!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1577690/Video_Game_Fables/?beta=0

Watch some extended footage here:
https://youtu.be/_RfJkc88-F8

Watch a gameplay demo with my commentary here:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dcsD4nAFLN0

Lighthearted RPG being created by solo indie developer Matt Sharp (Momiji Studios). Join Aru, Nate, and Tator on their journey through this RPG world that hasn't had a player for decades...until now. Everyone is a little out of practice, some of them are old and crusty, and on top of all that the script gets completely ruined. It's up to these three to get things back to normal...or maybe change things forever.

Follow me on Twitter for the most frequent updates:
https://twitter.com/momijistudios
Sign up to receive updates here:
https://mailchi.mp/7cb45b34cc66/video-game-fables-momiji-studios
